title: IS ORNN ONE OF THE WATCHERS???
body:
(sorry for the clickbait title ^_^")

The Watchers have been described as immensely powerful being responsible for bestowing the power of the iceborn (Lissandra's race) to humans in exchange for their loyalty.

Ornn has been described as a god who forges mountains like a blacksmith forges weapons.

Seeing as up to this point the Watchers were the closest thing to deities we had heard about from the Freljord, perhaps Ornn has some connection to them. 

Perhaps he is the first of the Watchers, and all others after him became corrupted with the power of true ice. Perhaps he is simply one among the ancient race and not necessarily the procreator, but the only one who has not embraced the power of true ice. Perhaps they were empowered by true ice to begin with and he simply broke away because he didn't like what he was seeing. Perhaps he gained some power taboo to them and was exiled. Perhaps he was simply so powerful that he was the only one left after their eradication. Perhaps he was their ruler, bestowed with some great force of nature. Perhaps he was their "Chosen One", and his powers are a some sort of sign. Perhaps the progenitor of the Watchers' race is his evil twin brother. Perhaps he thirsted for power, sought knowledge, or was simply eccentric and through any of those means stumbled upon his powers.

There are countless possibilities, so let's see what you guys can come up with! Leave your thoughts in the comment section bellow! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
